name: Yuujou no Victory Goal 4v4 Arashi: Get the Goal!
overview: The player, aims toward 4 v 4 nationwide conference championship and 4 v 4 world cup victories. The fast paced action should keep even the sports fan excited. Depth of play is expanded with exciting modes such as the free play mode which enables you to create the team of your likings, and the opposition mode in which you can play others using a communication cable.
